tags: can you tell ive never written anything risque before
anyways thank you so so much for this prompt!
summary: something with Caleb (or Caleb/Molly if you want) +99, "Magical accidents"?
question: something with Caleb (or Caleb/Molly if you want) +99, "Magical accidents"?
answer:
(thank you for this prompt!! i was going to make it angsty but really these kids just need happiness and some fun, also this isn’t nsfw so much as inadvisable for work but it’s under the cut anyways)

Caleb, jacket discarded on the wooden floor and back pressed against the headboard, felt Molly tease his shirt collar to the side and press a kiss to the base of his neck and begin working upwards. He felt a slight pinch catch under his jaw, Molly murmured something in a language Caleb did not understand, and just as he inhaled sharply and lifted his hand to run it through Molly’s hair, there was a whoosh of air and a sudden flash and the curtains caught fire.

At the same time Caleb said, “What in the—”

Molly froze and looked back and said, “Was that me?”

They sat there in silence, watching flames lick the windowsill. Then Caleb calmly reached down, felt for his coat, retrieved a small diamond from one of the pouches, spun it between his fingers, and sent a ray of ice glittering across the room and onto the burning fabric.

It went out, and he put the diamond on the bedside table, and looked down at Molly with a mildly shit-eating grin.

“Was that you?” he asked.

Molly felt his ears color for an entirely different reason. He sat back, and sighed. “It, er, it might have been.”

“Might have been?” Caleb asked. Amusement was now battling a deep-rooted scholarly interest. “You mean it happened accidentally?”

“What, you’ve never done magic by accident before?” Molly grumbled. “You’ve never accidentally made a sword glow or controlled someone or caused a bush to catch fire or something?”

Caleb rubbed his chin. “Actually, no,” he said. “I am a wizard, not a sorcerer, and all of my magic is learned and intentional. I have cast spells incorrectly before, and sometimes they have had unintended effects, but I have never done something involuntary before. That is actually quite impressive.”

“Thanks,” said Molly. “I have no idea how I did that.”

“It must’ve been verbally triggered, I remember you said something before it happened, and I assume it is a result of your hellish heritage,” Caleb continued, now reached for the nightstand again and feeling for one of his books. “Perhaps it is a byproduct of high-running emotions, channeled through the power of Infernal, and then—” 

“Alright, alright,” Molly said a smidge testily, “weren’t we in the middle of something? I’m pretty sure I was just about to make your evening.”

“I think you just did, with that flaming curtain—”

“Not what I meant,” and he leaned in to shut the wizard up with a kiss. 

Caleb smirked, and put his book away, and reached up to cup Molly’s cheek.

tags: god i love that kind of scenes
summary: Critical Role ep 97
body:
Critical Role ep 97

Everyone around the table: *Talks about how taking more money from Thordak could have helped Tary out of the shit his father put him in while Keyleth tries to argue otherwise*

Tary: Money would have solved this.

Keyleth: No! Not the lesson, not the lesson we’re supposed to take away!

summary: Oh! Um... for the character ask meme - how about Beau and Jester? 💕
question: Oh! Um... for the character ask meme - how about Beau and Jester? 💕
answer:
Ahhhh thank you! Two of my fave characters from campaign 2 ❤️

Beau:
Similarities:
I’m also not great with emotions
I know how to fight with a staff
I also love Yasha
I also want to keep Caleb from making stupid mistakes (AKA no Caleb you can’t “bend reality to [your] will” no bad plan why)
I try really hard to be nice to my friends

Differences:
I am terrified of breaking the law
I have a good relationship with my parents
I don’t really drink
I’d like to think I’m slightly less awkward than Beau

Jester

Similarities:
I also LOVE pastries
I’m a pretty happy and bubbly person I think
My character in my D&D campaign is also a cleric! (Does that count?)
I also adore Kiri
I like spending a lot of time reading and drawing
I annoy my friends about the books I’m reading (ie Jester’s sobbing conversation with Beau in the middle of the night about Tusk Love)

Differences:

I’m nowhere near as mischievous as Jester
I don’t trust The Traveler
I didn’t have quite the sheltered childhood Jester did
I probably wouldn’t join a fight club in a bar? And fight my friend just for fun?

summary: To Be Understood - RaiBread - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: To Be Understood - RaiBread - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Hey so uh, I wrote a thing? My first fanfic in… idk so many years??? Had to get an AO3 account to share it on, thankfully someone offered me an invite or I’d be waiting over a week.

It’s just Caleb and Molly having a little talk while Caleb cools down after another inter-party conflict. It CAN be shippy if you want it to be but is not inherently so? So I think even non-shippers could enjoy it.

tags: i'm just gonna keep selfpromoting this
i'm actually pretty happy with how something i wrote turned out for once
summary: Where Beauty Softens Grief
title: Where Beauty Softens Grief
body:
summary: Caleb is the owner of Dancing Lights Vintage and Antique Wares. He spends his days running his shop, hanging out at The Traveler’s Blessing Café with his friends, and trying to recover from his past. It’s a quiet and calm and routine kind of life, and Caleb likes it that way. Then Mollymauk Tealeaf opens a tattoo parlor next door.
pairing: Widomauk
length: Currently 5,611 (2 chapters), will be ~20k (7 chapters) when finished
rating: Explicit (for future chapters)
notes: Please see ao3 tags for content warnings

Read here!

tags: BEAU LOVES JESTER SO MUCH BYYYYYE
summary: "Damn it, Beau, we need him alive!" Molly yells, but Beau doesn't stop, her fists connecting with the slaver's already...
question: "Damn it, Beau, we need him alive!" Molly yells, but Beau doesn't stop, her fists connecting with the slaver's already brutalized face over and over again.
answer:
“How. Dare. You. Hurt. Them”, Beau hisses and each word is underlined by another punch while the slaver’s face beneath her resembles raw meat more than an actual face.

He deserves it.

When she found Jester beaten and bloodied and crying in that cage, Beau snapped. Now this pig will pay for what he did.

A hand catches hers and Beau tries to struggle as Yasha gently, way too gently, pulls Beau off the slaver who’s now barely breathing on the ground.

“We need to know where they take the other people”, Yasha says quietly.

Beau crumbles in her grasp, her eyes searching for Jester who’s still unconcious a few feet away from them, her pretty face all cut up and painted with bruises.

Jester shouldn’t look like this.

Bruises and wounds like this are meant for people like Beau.

“Why didn’t they take me”, she hisses, her eyes burning at the corners and she swallows multiple times while Molly and Nott bind the slaver’s wrists behind his back.

“It’s fine”, Yasha says while Beau tries to hold back a sob. “We’re fine now. She’ll be fine.”

“How. Dare. You. Hurt. Them”, Beau hisses and each word is underlined by another punch while the slaver’s face beneath her resembles raw meat more than an actual face.

He deserves it.

When she found Jester beaten and bloodied and crying in that cage, Beau snapped. Now this pig will pay for what he did.

Jester shouldn’t look like this.

Bruises and wounds like this are meant for people like Beau.

“Why didn’t they take me”, she hisses, her eyes burning at the corners and she swallows multiple times while Molly and Nott bind the slaver’s wrists behind his back.

“It’s fine”, Yasha says while Beau tries to hold back a sob. “We’re fine now. She’ll be fine.”

summary: “you act as though the laws of the anthill affect the boot that crushes it.”  a critical role villains playlist. tracklist below...
caption:
“you act as though the laws of the anthill affect the boot that crushes it.”

a critical role villains playlist.

tracklist below the cut.

the briarwoods

angel of small death and the codeine scene // hozier

fresh from the fields, all feeder and fertile / it’s bloody and raw, but I swear it is sweet

ramalama (bang bang) // roisin murphy

i would give it all, and all / maybe you would give me less for half a chance

bedroom hymns // florence + the machine

sweating out confessions / the undone and the divine

lullaby variation // fernando velázquez

instrumental

till the bitter end // the magnetic fields

past rhyme, and reason and beyond the pale / darling, i will love you till the bitter end 

ripley

the wolf // phildel

the wishes i’ve made are too vicious to tell / everyone knows i am going to hell / and if it’s true / i’ll go there with you

don’t play // halsey

i’m moving on, i’m getting paid / i’m on my own, i had some space to deal with it

little drop of poison // tom waits

did the devil make the world while god was sleeping / you’ll never get a wish from a bone

spiked bat // kyle dixon, michael stein

instrumental

the stupid, the proud // iamx

queer is the universe / habit the liberty, destructive in time / hunt down your future / and everything you know is not enough to survive

thordak

emperor’s new clothes // panic! at the disco

if it feels good, tastes good / it must be mine / heroes always get remembered / but you know legends never die

the brainwasher // daft punk

i am the brainwasher

i want to eat your face // david spear

i’d like to eat your smile / it could be so beguiling / if i could eat your smile / i’d be smiling

aristocrats of karnaca (suspense) // daniel licht

instrumental

battle royale - vip mix // apashe, panther

hear the sound of the bells when the law gone / and the boys will leash hell when the war’s on

raishan

grace for sale // terrance zdunich

lay you down to sleep / with wicked little stories / count your missing sheep / shed my skin, my fleece, my sin, my worms

pretty little head // eliza rickman

kill for the thrill / cut it, stick it where you got him

empire // alpines

i must say this is as good as it gets / so why you wasting your blood, your sweat, your tears

shadows // gustavo santaolalla

instrumental

seven devils // florence + the machine

and no rivers and no lakes can put the fire out / i’m gonna raise the stakes, i’m gonna smoke you out

vecna

blood // my chemical romance

i can’t control myself because i don’t know how / and they love me for it honestly, i’ll be here for a while

infiltration // henry jackman

instrumental

playing with the big boys // the prince of egypt cast

you put up a front, you put up a fight / and just to show we feel no spite / you can be our acolyte / but first boy, it’s time to bow

we want war // these new puritans

the paths are a labyrinth or even a trap / some tides don’t turn, some things never come back

cherubim // serpentwithfeet

boy, as i build your throne / i feel myself growing / sewing love into you is my job / sewing love into you is my job / anything else is a weak curse, oh

“you act as though the laws of the anthill affect the boot that crushes it.”

a critical role villains playlist.

tracklist below the cut.

summary: "Twenty gold says I can get Caleb's nose out of that book. Five more says I can do it without touching him."
question: "Twenty gold says I can get Caleb's nose out of that book. Five more says I can do it without touching him."
answer:
Beau wrinkles her nose and pulls a face that makes Molly grin even wider than he did before.

“Why do you think I want to see that”, Beau says and crosses her arms in front of her chest. Molly sticks out his tongue.

“I don’t think you can do it anyway. He’s been reading that book for three hours now.”

“So you‘re taking my bet?”

“I’ll take it!”, Jester cuts in, hugging Beau from behind and  making her stiffen for a second and then Molly watches her melt into Jester, leaning back and holding back a smile.

Molly stands up and saunters over to where Fjord sits and seems to be writing some kind of letter. When Molly comes close he looks up, at first confused and then Molly can see a dark shade of green creep up on his cheeks as he takes in the predatory gleam in Molly’s eyes.

“Hey there, Mr Fjord”, he purrs and Fjord opens his mouth to protest when Molly sits down on his lap, tilts Fjord’s head back with his left hand and presses his lips to Fjord’s.

He hears Beau’s sound of surprise and disgust and Jester’s squeal.

This thing between them is pretty new but Fjord had said he wouldn’t mind telling the others. Plus, Molly thinks as he presses closer to Fjord and draws very pretty sounds out of him, this is the perfect tactic to get Caleb to notice them.

Because while being with one person is very nice, it would be even nicer if there was a third person involved. Someone he and Fjord like just as much as they like each other.

“IT WORKED!”, Jester calls excitedly.
